dryrun.description: Don't execute any actions and output a transcript of what would have been done

psbt.description: An initial psbt to begin the splice with

user_provided_sats.description: The amount of sats being contributed by the initial psbt

force_feerate.description: By default splices will fail if the fee provided looks too high. This is to protect against accidentally setting your fee higher than intended. Set `force_feerate` to true to skip this saftey check

json.description: A json payload of instructions can be passed instead of script

debug_log.description: Adds a verbose log of each splice calculation step to the result

wetrun.description: Executes the splice up until the point signatures would be sent and then aborts
